includedAssets.title: Mad Max
includedAssets.synopsis: Post-apocalyptic action thriller starring Mel Gibson as a highway cop fuelled by revenge after brutal bikers slay his family. From director George Miller.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Post-apocalyptic action thriller starring Mel Gibson as a highway cop fuelled by revenge after brutal bikers slay his family. From George Miller.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Post-apocalyptic action thriller starring Mel Gibson as a highway cop fuelled by revenge after brutal bikers slay his family. From director George Miller.

includedAssets.title: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
includedAssets.synopsis: Mel Gibson crosses a post-apocalyptic wasteland to fight for a small community against gasoline raiders. Classic action.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mel Gibson crosses a post-apocalyptic wasteland to fight for a small community against gasoline raiders. Classic action.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mel Gibson crosses a post-apocalyptic wasteland to fight for a small community against gasoline raiders. Classic action.

includedAssets.title: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
includedAssets.synopsis: Mel Gibson plays the lone road warrior forced to fight in the gladiatorial arena of Bartertown, under the rule of queen Tina Turner.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mel Gibson plays the lone road warrior forced to fight in the gladiatorial arena of Bartertown, under the rule of queen Tina Turner.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mel Gibson plays the lone road warrior forced to fight in the gladiatorial arena of Bartertown, under the rule of queen Tina Turner.

includedAssets.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
includedAssets.synopsis: Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron star in this action adventure about a rebel and a drifter who team up in post-apocalyptic Australia.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron star in this action adventure about a rebel and a drifter who team up in post-apocalyptic Australia.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron star in this action adventure about a rebel and a drifter who team up in post-apocalyptic Australia.

includedAssets.title: Mad Max Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: In a world where society has collapsed into chaos, a drifter travels the Australian wasteland seeking revenge for his murdered family, a reason to live and a means to survive. Dystopian action from director George Miller. Mel Gibson, Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, a drifter travels the wasteland seeking a reason to live and a means to survive. Mel Gibson and Tom Hardy star.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In a world where society has collapsed into chaos, a drifter travels the Australian wasteland seeking revenge for his murdered family, a reason to live and a means to survive. Dystopian action from director George Miller. Mel Gibson, Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron star.
